entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:08 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
